name: Angry Neighbor Escape from Hellish Grandma's House
name_original: Angry Neighbor Escape from Hellish Grandma's House
description:
Escape Angry Grandma's House game - is simple but hard to master crazy angry hell neighbor house escape game - jump & run arcade adventure about haunted gran evil neighborhood.

Angry Hell neighbor grandma asked you to meet in her hellish home. Maybe crazy gran can give you a pie or Xmas sweets? No ! It is your luck you can run & jump before saying "Hello, grandma!", because angry gran is really evil & angry gran from Hell !!! Try to escape neighbor grandma's house as far as possible & return to your parents! Every step is dangerous, some traps are really hard - granny is master of trapping kids! 
Move carefully not be captured by moving saw or escape fall into the pit of acid death! What you only can do in this crazy place is Run & Run faster!
★ Blox series first game
★ New hell neighbor escape
★ Easy controls 
★ Dangerous neighbor traps - lots of traps in Grandma's crazy hellish place
★ Blox graphics just to have fun with traps
★ Small game size
★ Featured cool arcade sounds & music loops!

Explore all haunted hellish house rooms & cellar!

Crazy Grandma's home full of traps, saw & acid around for all fans of such hardcore run & jump game!

★ Enjoy Escape Grandma's House - Blox #1 Series game ★
